alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jo Daviess and northwestern Stephenson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Stockton, or 18 miles north of Mount Carroll, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nora around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Warren and Apple River. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
